snippet.title: Into The Restless Ruins - Console Announcement Trailer | Steam Next Fest
snippet.description:
A roguelike deckbuilder where you create the dungeon you fight through—rooted in Scottish folklore, myths and legends. Into The Restless Ruins is coming to PS5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch and PC this Spring. Play the demo and Wishlist in the Steam Next Fest!

Play the Demo & Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2877770/Into_the_Restless_Ruins/

Developed by Ant Workshop.
Published by Wales Interactive.

#SteamNextFest #Roguelike #Deckbuilder
